basics.name: Meryem İriş
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a Frontend Developer with skills in React(Next.js), Vue.js, and TypeScript, building dynamic web apps. I've recently explored React Native.

courses: React - The Complete Guide 2023 (incl. React Router & Redux)

projects.name: Useless Facts Viewer
projects.description: A Single-page application uses Useless Facts API and Next.js App Router
highlights: To demonstrate the functionality of the app feel free to sign in or here's an existed user credantials: Email: test@gmail.com Password: test123
Fact viewer; Fetches random facts from the Useless Facts API using Axios
User Authentication; Utilizes Supabase server-side Auth for user creation
Save facts; Fact basket feature; enables users to add both random and today's facts to the basket. Saved facts feature; retrieves facts from the database, permanent storage.

projects.name: Marketing Metrics Chart App
projects.description: A Chart App displays marketing metrics built with Vue.js, TailwindCSS, and Chart.js
highlights: Responsive design for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

projects.name: Flight Search App
projects.description: A Flight Search App built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript.
highlights: Sample Search Data: departureAirport: Amsterdam, arrivalAirport: Frankfurt, departureTime: 12.12.2024, returnTime: 12.12.2024
Search flight based on airports, departure, arrival, and dates
Sort flights by price, duration, departure, and arrival.
